attributes.action: Quash Jaden Thompsons conviction of common assault
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jaden Thompson gave his attacker a black eye. His attacker had attacked him once before but his attackers nephew in the police force is friends with the attending/arresting officer & all other officers involved in the false charging of Mr Thompson are all also linked as friends on facebook. Mr Roberts has used masonic links to have his victim charged & convicted of common assault. Mr Thompson has no convictions for violence & has no violent history. He is the founder of ChristianWebs.co.uk & the Proof Of God campaign. Full story & evidence can be perused at www.WiltshirePolice.com

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
